node.html:
• Architecting and implementing the frontend stack for Ascertia's Flagship Product SigningHub. It is a document signing and workflow management web app.

  • Leading, guiding, mentoring the team, code reviews, pull requests
  • Working on a SVG based Document viewer. Rendering SVG based documents

• Developed and maintained code for in-house and client webapps primarily using React, Vue.js, Nuxt, HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript

  • Tech stack includes: • Vue 3 • Nuxt 2 • Vuex 4 (Pinia) • Vite 2 | Vitesse • Storybook Ui • TailwindCSS | WindiCSS
  • Worked for Holedo TMR – Talent Management and Recruitment
  • Tech stack includes: • React, React Router • Redux Toolkit • RTK Query • Custom Hooks • React-hook-form • YUP Validation • Tanstack Table
